hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Barzah Al-Aslami that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:”The two parties to a transaction have the choice (of annulling it) so long as they have not yet parted

chapter.ara-name: باب الْبَيِّعَانِ بِالْخِيَارِ مَا لَمْ يَفْتَرِقَا
chapter.eng-name: The Two Parties To A Transaction Have The Choice (Of Annulling It) So Long As They Have
